attributes.action: Make sure the RSS Boaty McBoatface is the name of the new polar research vessel
attributes.additional_details: Basically nothing says Britain more than having a polar research vassel called "Boaty McBoatface"
attributes.background: The British public were asked to vote, and while I love the name "RSS I Like Big Boats & I Cannot Lie", I think this is too frivolous, and we should concentrate on serious 'British' names like "Boaty McBoatface"

rejection.details: This is a decision for the Natural Environment Research Council, not the Government or Parliament.
